archetypes.label: Wanderer
archetypes.description: Flexible explorer with balanced growth and adaptation.

archetypes.label: Delver
archetypes.description: Resource-focused scavenger who excels in treasure and survival loops.

archetypes.label: Warden
archetypes.description: Disciplined protector focused on control, defense, and attrition.

archetypes.label: Hunter
archetypes.description: Aggressive pursuer optimized for combat pressure and momentum spikes.

archetypes.label: Tactician
archetypes.description: Information-first strategist who converts insight into leverage.

archetypes.label: Showrunner
archetypes.description: Fame-driven performer who grows stronger through audience pressure.
